Description: Fragment of flattened handle of a Thasian pottery transport amphora. Clay near fine, micaceous, light orange-brown. Rectangular stamp with B symbol.
Curator's comments: Petrie Diary (EES Archive XVII 47) p. 201, 34? Name Polyneikes.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0028)
